metadata.title: ELSA-2020-1665:  qt5 security, bug fix, and enhancement update (MODERATE)
metadata.description:
python-qt5
[5.13.1-1]
- 5.13.1
  Resolves: bz#1775603

qgnomeplatform
[0.4-3]
- Rebuild (qt5)
  Resolves: bz#1774418

qt5
[5.12.5-3]
- Re-add srpm macros, just leave them empty
  Resolves: bz#1733133

[5.12.5-2]
- Drop srpm macros as we dont ship qtwebengine
  Resolves: bz#1733133

[5.12.5-1]
- 5.12.5 + sync with Fedora
  Resolves: bz#1733133

qt5-qt3d
[5.12.5-2]
- Fix multilib issue
  Resolves: bz#1765637

[5.12.5-1]
- 5.12.5
  Resolves: bz#1733159

qt5-qtbase
[5.12-5-4]
- Fix build on RHEL 7 kernel
  Resolves: bz#1733135

[5.12-5-2]
- Remove Android specific test to avoid unnecessary dependencies
  Resolves: bz#1733135

[5.12-5-1]
- 5.12.5 + sync with Fedora
  Resolves: bz#1733135
